newsitem.title: POLAND: Espebepe extends last week's surge.
newsitem.headline: Espebepe extends last week's surge.

text.p: Polish debt-ridden builder Espebepe SA rose 9.5 percent to 5.75 zlotys, extending last week's 41.9-percent surge after the previous week's steep fall as speculators played on the firm's unclear fate, traders said.
Last month Espebepe, which has 75 million zlotys in debts and faces the risk of bankruptcy, had a creditors' meeting postponed to April 14.
Some traders said the stock's balanced trade after price-fixing could signal a return to falls on Wednesday but others said the stock was too speculative to predict.
